invariants.statement: Σ is linear and associative on its domain.
invariants.formal: Σ(aX \+ bY) \= a ΣX \+ b ΣY, and Σ(Σ(X,Y),Z) \= Σ(X,Σ(Y,Z)).

invariants.statement: Σ must respect DomainTensorRankInvariant (only contracted indices reduce rank).
invariants.formal: Rank change under Σ must match explicit contraction specifications.
